name: Ley Line Disorder: Diminishing Momentum
description:
End Phase: Deal 6 Physical DMG to all opposing characters.
When any character takes DMG: The next time this card deals DMG, decrease the DMG dealt by 1.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 6 $[K100] to all opposing characters.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When any character takes DMG:</color> The next time this card deals DMG, decrease the DMG dealt by 1.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 6 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> to all opposing characters.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When any character takes DMG:</color> The next time this card deals DMG, decrease the DMG dealt by 1.
